thread.title_full: Quick Stay in London - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: marrissamaries
title: Quick Stay in London -
text: Visiting family for a couple of days. The service and staff were great. Definitely recommend having dinner at the restaurant. Most delicious food we've had. Very warm welcome to London. Great area - right near tube stations and bus stops. Recommend for those looking for a great hotel in a great area.
